content:
Great choice on the dark, rich colors! Both silver and gold can complement dark colors, but it ultimately depends on the overall aesthetic you're going for.

Silver can create a striking contrast with dark colors, making them pop even more. A silver chain or accents can add a touch of modernity and edginess to your Scorpio necklace. If you want a more dramatic look, silver could be an excellent choice.

On the other hand, gold can add a sense of luxury and sophistication to your design. A gold chain or accents can warm up the dark colors and create a more vintage or bohemian vibe. Gold can also complement the Scorpio symbol's association with intensity and passion.

Considering your recent purchase of the silver star pendant, you might want to stick with silver to create a cohesive look in your jewelry collection. However, if you want to add some warmth and contrast to your Scorpio necklace, gold could be a great option.

You could also consider a mix of both metals, like a silver chain with gold accents or vice versa. This can add depth and visual interest to your design.

Ultimately, the choice between silver and gold comes down to your personal preference and the style you're aiming for. You could also consult with a jewelry designer or try out different metal combinations in a design mockup to see what looks best to you.

By the way, it's great that you've been enjoying your star pendant! Wearing a piece of jewelry that brings you joy can definitely elevate your daily outfits and confidence.
